explanation: Interfaces can extend other interfaces hence option 2 is wrong. However, only classes and abstract classes can implement Interfaces.
question: Which of the following statements about inheritance in Java is True?
correct_answers: 3 In `A implements B`, A must be a class or an abstract class.
incorrect_answers: 1 In `A extends B`, A must be a class or an abstract class.
2 In `A extends B`, B must be a class or an abstract class.
4 In `A implements B`, B must be a class or an abstract class.

explanation: Option 1. c1 and c2 are both pointing to the same address value hence, true.
correct_answers: 1 c1 == c2 always evaluates to true;
incorrect_answers: 2 c1 == c2 always evaluates to false;
4 c1.equals(c2) may evaluate true for false
